alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 2:41PM EST until January 10 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and considerable blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Lesser snow amounts of 1 to locally 4 inches are expected south and west of a line from Au Train to Steuben. Northwest winds gusting from 30 to 40 mph, highest along the Lake Superior shoreline, will cause near-zero visibility at times in snow and blowing snow. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to near impossible at times Sunday through Monday as considerable blowing and drifting of snow is expected. Wind chills dropping as low as 20 below zero by Sunday night could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
